segments.text: You've got a beautiful singing voice !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's this high-tech equipment that doctors my voice a little . Actually , i am tone-deaf .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come on , You hit the high notes perfectly !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , the echo and the stereo system helped a lot . And i know that song very well , so , i didn't need to pay attention to the subtitles which helped as well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're too modest . Pass me the catalogue ! I'd like to see which song to choose.Wow , this place has a large selection of songs . I dont know which to choose !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Pick the one that you always sing in the shower .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Funny.Oh , i like this song . It's by one of my favorite singers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: 1021.It ' s a duet ! Come on , Pick the mic and sing along !
segments.speaker: S1
